properties.description: This dataflow processes internet order blobs from the storage account to DQ

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		orderid as integer,
		orderdate as string,
		customer as integer,
		product as integer,
		units as integer,
		billingaddress as string,
		remarks as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> OrdersInputSource
source(output(
		customerid as integer,
		fullname as string,
		address as string,
		credit as integer,
		status as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Customers
source(output(
		itemdiscount as short,
		productid as short,
		title as string,
		unitprice as short,
		unitsinstock as short
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'arrayOfDocuments') ~> Products
source(output(
		CityId as integer,
		CityName as string,
		Region as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> CapitalCities
